scenario_text.value: ...It should be safe here.

The amusement park.... It’s gone...
Miu... Oh, Miu...

(The entire amusement park has been consumed
by the fog.)

(There’s nothing there. No one... Miu’s
gone.)

Um, T-Takuma... I don’t see Miu here. What...
What does...
She...got swallowed up by the fog.
No! No!!! You couldn’t save her?!
I’m sorry. I lost my head...

We certainly understand how you feel. We know
you meant no harm.

Yeah, it’s not your fault, Saki. You ain’t
even wrong.
Kaito?

I hesitated to jump into the fog...
Why did I do that?

Takuma made it back, so Miu could’ve done the
same.
But my legs froze for just a moment...

It’s just like Miu said...I wasn’t thinking
about protecting her at all...

Did I just wanna swing my fists...? Vent my
frustrations, high on my own strength?

That’s not fair to you. I mean, I understand
how you feel, but...
He ain’t gonna listen to ya now.
But Dracumon...

Leave him alone. Nothing you say now’s gonna
reach him.
(Kaito...)

If only I had the power to kill them all...
Power that’d let me do anything for Miu...!

She’d be alive right now.
I wouldn’t have hesitated or nothing...
Power... I...
